notes: Because of rounding, details may not add to total. FY 2020 obligations include additional funding provided by supplemental COVID-19–related appropriations (e.g., Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security [CARES] Act).
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Federal Funds for Research and Development, FYs 2020–21.
